title: I'm a doctor at Italy's hardest-hit hospital. I had to decide who got a ventilator and who didn't
description: Guglielmo Gianotti has fought on the medical frontline of Italy's coronavirus crisis. He saw the wave of patients overwhelm his hospital, then he caught the virus himself. He has a warning for other countries like Australia.
content:
Posted 
March 27, 2020 05:55:24
I am the executive director of surgery at the Cremona hospital, which has probably been the hardest hit by the coronavirus outbreak in northern Italy. 
It's where the first patient died in this country.
Like every hospital … [+7022 chars]
